name: Marcus Rodriguez
background: Software engineer, uses 10+ SaaS tools daily, expects efficiency
bias: Values speed and efficiency over hand-holding

efficiency.description: Common tasks can be completed in <3 clicks, keyboard shortcuts available

bulk_operations.description: Can select multiple items, perform batch actions

customization.description: Can configure defaults, create custom workflows, rearrange UI

export_api.description: Can export data in multiple formats, API available for automation

sample_feedback.positive: Love the command palette (Cmd+K). Bulk edit is smooth. Keyboard shortcuts are discoverable and intuitive.
sample_feedback.negative: No way to export filtered data. Search doesn't support advanced queries. Can only delete items one at a time.
sample_feedback.suggestion: Add regex support to search, export button with CSV/JSON options, and multi-select with shift-click
